We will be using the following packages for this assignment:

```{r, loading packages, message = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

```

# Problem 1

## Mr. Trash Wheel

### Importing and Cleaning Mr. Trash Wheel
```{r, mr_trash_wheel, message = FALSE}

trash_df = 
  read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
              sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
              skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select("dumpster":"homes_powered") %>%
  drop_na("dumpster") %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls, digits = 0))

```

### Precipitation Data

```{r, precipitation, message = FALSE}
#Importing & cleaning 2018 Precipitation Data:

precip_2018 = 
  read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
              sheet = "2018 Precipitation",
              skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na("month") %>%
  mutate(year = 2018)

  
#Importing & cleaning 2019 Precipitation Data:

precip_2019 = 
  read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
              sheet = "2019 Precipitation",
              skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(c("month", "total")) %>%
  mutate(year = 2019)

```


### Combining Precipitation Data
```{r, combining precipitation, message = FALSE}

precip_all = 
  bind_rows(precip_2018, precip_2019) %>%
  mutate(month = month.name[as.numeric(month)])

```


# Problem 2

## FiveThirtyEight Data

### Politicians Dataset
```{r, politicians, message = FALSE}

politicians_df =
  read_csv("data/fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") %>%
  separate("mon", into = c("year", "month", "day")) %>%
  mutate(
    month = month.name[as.numeric(month)],
    president = recode(prez_dem, "0" = "gop", "1" = "dem")) %>%
  select(-day, -prez_dem, -prez_gop)

```


### snp Dataset
```{r, snp data, message = FALSE}

snp_df = 
  read_csv("data/fivethirtyeight_datasets/snp.csv") %>%
  separate("date", into = c("month", "day", "year")) %>%
  mutate(
    month = month.name[as.numeric(month)],
    year = as.numeric(year),
    year = if_else(year <= 15, year + 2000, year + 1900),
    day = as.numeric(day)
  ) %>%
  select(year, month, close)
  
```


### Unemployment Dataset
```{r, unemployment data, message = FALSE}

unemploy_df = 
  read_csv("data/fivethirtyeight_datasets/unemployment.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```
